title: Bug 14943: Code Assist does not respect platform line ends
description: Bug 14943: Code Assist does not respect platform line ends. The issue is that the Code Assist feature does not display the appropriate line ending characters based on the platform.
OB: Currently, the Code Assist feature does not correctly display the line ending characters.
EB: The Code Assist feature should display the corresponding CR/LF line ending characters based on the platform.
SR: Ensure that the Code Assist feature accurately reflects the line ending characters based on the platform.
